name: Trap World
description:
"Trap World" is an addictive platform game for troll game lovers. There are hundreds of traps carefully placed in every part of the game. If you trust yourself, download it without thinking. You must force your mind to pass the levels. The controls are very smooth and fluid. It has also a sad story:

In a beautiful day Kate and Super Sharlo were walking in the forest. While they were making plans about wedding, unfortunately a Red Dragon kidnapped Kate. Helpless Sharlo goes after dragon.
In this trap-full adventure, can you find Kate and rescue her from monsters?

Fantastic Game Studios Team 2018.
